revised_title: Genetic Control and the Formation of Organisms
tldr: This article discusses the progress made in understanding the role of genes in the formation and structure of living organisms. It covers the history of genetic research, from the discovery of genes and their inheritance to the molecular biology era and the introduction of purified genes into living cells. The author emphasizes the importance of understanding gene control and the potential for creating novel genetic constitutions through genetic engineering.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Molecular Biology
